channel.title: Comments on: Nominated for the Tribal Awards
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
“These awards are not for some tattoos on your lower back or on your biceps”

I was expecting more actually, I pictured you in a full tribal gear, body paint and all(need to cut down on my youtube video intake).

Well done my friend, I shall be voting

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.dc:creator: Ted Krueger (onpnt)
item.description: I think it would be much cooler if it was for tattoos. :) Congrats on the nomination, Koen.
item.content:encoded: I think it would be much cooler if it was for tattoos. ðŸ™‚ Congrats on the nomination, Koen.
